mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(distinct B.ifeed) AS feedCnt, COUNT(C.ifeed) AS favCnt, A.nm as writerNm, A.created_at as createdAt FROM t_user A LEFT JOIN t_feed B ON A.iuser = B.iuser JOIN t_feed_fav C ON B.ifeed = C.ifeed WHERE A.iuser = #{targetIuser}
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM t_user_follow WHERE from_iuser = #{fromIuser} AND to_iuser = #{toIuser}
